column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last Fourth of July we had a nice family dinner outside .
#id=2
#text=Unfortunately the sun was so hot and we had nothing to provide us shade .
#id=3
#text=This year I wanted to do something different so I decided to plant a tree right where the table was outside .
#id=4
#text=Maybe this year we would have some shade to keep us cool .
#id=5
#text=I went to the local farmer , farmer Jack and asked him if he could help me out .
#id=6
#text=He told me that I would want to grow a nice oak tree right by that table .
#id=7
#text=He was able to give me some seeds to use so I could make my plan happen .
#id=8
#text=I used a small gardening tool to dig up some dirt .
#id=9
#text=I placed the seeds inside the dirt and then covered it up again .
#text=I took a watering can and filled it up with water from the hose .
#text=I watered the dirt where the seeds were and did this every day without fail .
#text=I 've started to see a tree sprouting and am excited for Fourth of July to get here .
